body_html:
Replace method_of with a simple list of method and/or function.
This means eventually all of THNN ends up in torch, as it's ported to native?

Also, is there something to be done about operators? Declarations.yaml doesn't seem to contain anything on them (e.g. __mul__ in Python).
body_text:
Replace method_of with a simple list of method and/or function.
This means eventually all of THNN ends up in torch, as it's ported to native?

Also, is there something to be done about operators? Declarations.yaml doesn't seem to contain anything on them (e.g. __mul__ in Python).
body:
> Replace method_of with a simple list of method and/or function.
This means eventually all of THNN ends up in torch, as it's ported to native?

Also, is there something to be done about operators? Declarations.yaml doesn't seem to contain anything on them (e.g. `__mul__` in Python).
